title: How to Make Peanut Butter and Jelly Stuffed French Toast

steps.headline: Make the sandwiches.
steps.description: Spread a tablespoon of peanut butter and a tablespoon onto each of the bread pieces. Close them together to make six sandwiches. #

steps.headline: Beat the milk, eggs, and vanilla into a large bowl with a fork.
Preheat the stovetop to medium heat and place a frying pan or skillet on the heat.
steps.description: Spread the butter over the pan.

steps.headline: Dip each sandwich into the egg mixture.
Cook the French toast.
steps.description: Place the sandwiches on the hot frying pan with butter and flip after 5-6 minutes. Cook both sides until golden brown.

steps.headline: Place the French toast on a dish to cool.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a French toast sandwich on a serving plate. Drizzle with syrup and dust with powered sugar if desired. Enjoy!

text: Make the sandwiches. Spread a tablespoon of peanut butter and a tablespoon onto each of the bread pieces. Close them together to make six sandwiches. # Beat the milk, eggs, and vanilla into a large bowl with a fork.  Preheat the stovetop to medium heat and place a frying pan or skillet on the heat. Spread the butter over the pan. Dip each sandwich into the egg mixture.  Cook the French toast. Place the sandwiches on the hot frying pan with butter and flip after 5-6 minutes. Cook both sides until golden brown. Place the French toast on a dish to cool.  Serve. Place a French toast sandwich on a serving plate. Drizzle with syrup and dust with powered sugar if desired. Enjoy!
